description:
In case you are wondering what the biggest virus is it is the Microsoft Windows Operating System.

Shutter does not 
1> allow a user to save profile settings. The App indicates that it does. But really the "saved" profiles are not available even though they eat up disk space. The web site support offerred no idea about the problem.
2> the "select" feature is the worst part of the App. Most of the time it works great. But then the App's gremlins want to be nasty the PC is "locked-up". Even trying to return control of the PC/OS the Ubuntu Sys Monitor (End and/or Kill) does not clean the issue.  The only thing that works is a Hard POR.  This seems to occur about every month of so.

I guess the only alternative is Infaview though wine

Well, not entirely, the other options than capturing the full screen as well as most options in general availabe on this tool, are greyed out. When clicking the desktop button, after it took the screenshot, it seems to use the gnome screenshot tool interface, which allows to select other options, current screen and grab area, and it works, the picture can be edited and saved, the file is actually saved!
summary: 6th screenshot tool I test, this one actually works!

description:
The button for 'Selection' screenshot is disabled and shows the following hint: 

"Can't take screenshots without X11 Server"

OS Version: Ubuntu 22.04.4 LTS
summary: Error: Can't take screenshots without X11 Server

description: Unfortunately, Wayland is the future...

it seems to be the problem with most of the screen captures software , i tried K-snip and faced the same issue where options other than capturing full screen are grayed out and we are not able to enable it...Its a request to the developer to please find a workaround..Drink more coffee if you have to but please save us.
summary: why are options other than full screen not working?

description: For some reason only the Desktop option is enabled... I don't know how to enable Selection and Windows screenshot option
Awesome! Thank you so much. I can crop images, can use rectangle and arrows to emphasize.
Way better than the default tool to take a screenshot. Love the ability to edit the screenshots
Doesn't support Wayland, really buggy photo editor, doesn't seem like it is maintained anymore
summary: Used to be great, but not maintained anymore

description:
The icons don't scale according to the scale setting of my display (which is set to 150%).
Especially the icons in the Editor are very tiny.
It's a shame because it has lots of useful features.
Its unable to remove.
This app is excellent for screen capture and quick edits like drawing shapes and writing text. It's quite easy to use specially if you are already familiar with similar other screen capture tools.
Always takes a picture of the middle 1080 pixels of my screen vertically, and the entire workspace width (both monitors).
Great for simple tracking of successive screenshots.
Dont use this app. Try to make something good, instead making this garbage
'Shutter" works well on X11.

I used to use this ap a couple years ago, and I loved it. It hasn't worked since 22.04, or maybe before that. I would have thought Ubuntu would dump it, or the developers would fix it, but neither is happening. Sad.
Akward to use, can't start with area selection, the highlighter is stuck at size 18 and willl not adjust down.

App is good, trued multiple ways to resolve the issue.
But didnt work
summary: Multiple tabs are not working (Selection, Windowd, edit...)

description: As summary.
Works as a charm.

Looks like this is no longer being maintained. Majority of features stopped working after a few weeks. I advise searching for another screenshot tool, I'm taking a look at Flameshot right now. I will not edit this review to reflect my experience with that, though.
All screnshots apps desplce the image on a side when "reezing" the desctop to drow a rectangle, this one is the only one taht works ok for now.

As a long time user of Shutter in the Ubunu environment, it saddends me to report that it no longer works within the Ubuntu 22.04 environment. It started by failing to "see" any user profile.  Now it seems to want to go its own way when trying to File Save an image. It just goes off and eventually the the "Force Quit or Wait" query starts popping. Shutter does not respond to the "Force Quit". Then it is hit and miss using the Kill or End option in the SYstem Monitor.
summary: A Once Fantastic App Is Now Junk

description: The program does not appear on the screen in Ubuntu and GNOME with Wayland, but it works normally in versions with Xorg.
summary: Not working on Ubuntu 23.10 with Wayland

description: Does not work on Fedora 39 Gnome
summary: Does not work on Fedora 39 Gnome

description: Working fine on Ubuntu 22.04.1 LTS

The only snapshot you can use on Wayland is all your screens. In order to get a smaller selection you have to crop the image and resave it. 

I would give it a lower score but moving to wayland and KDE 6. seems to have broken all the screenshot apps I have tested so far and some are completely unusable.
einfach Bilder vom Desktop in Guter Qualität
Only option is to make screenshot of my Desktop :-)) rest is grey? Using a Ubuntu 22.04

Ich bin begeistert, genau das was ich lange gesucht habe. Ich kann Pfeile in meine Screenshots oder andere Fotos vn der Festplatte zeichen oder Umrandungen oder Texte einfügen. Ich kann auch Teile des Fotos unkenntlich machen und vieles mehr. Das einzige was aus meiner Sicht fehlt ist, dass man nur einen Bereich screenshoten kann, sow ie ich es gesehen habe kann man nur den ganzen Bildschirm schrenshoten. Aber man kann den Screenshot nachträglich mit Shutter schneiden.

Screenshot by area, select window or full desktop, save to specified directory with naming-tag, exactly what I need. Works perfectly for me for years now!
Thanks to the creators!

Shutter habe ich als gutes und leichtzu bedienendes Programm kennengelernt, aber unter dem neuen Ubuntu kann ich keine Auswahl mehr treffen nur den ganzen Bildschirm fotografieren, Auswahl ist ausgegraut.
sonst hätte ich 5 Sterne gegeben.
no se ejecuta para nada en mi sistema con ubuntu studio 22.4.
Envía tu captura a varias web. No se puede cambiar en preferencias. Compartes aunque no quieras. Ni la instaléis
summary: Envía tu captura a varias web

description:
Cuando haces una captura cualquiera que sea, sube estas a: Dropbox(subida OAuth), vgyme(subida anónima), Imgur(subida anónima y OAuth), ToileLibre(subida anónima) y Gyazo(subida anónima). Lo curioso es que no puedes desvalidar ninguna de estas opciones. Es privativa, sí, pero si quiero desvalidar alguna opción, porque no puedo? Y si el archivo es confidencial, porqué habría de mandar esta captura a 5 sitios(esos son los que hay escrito) distintos.
Mi valoración es que en un sistema libre, este tipo de programas no debían ni de estar. Por eso 1 estrella, automatiza acciones que no puedo desautorizar, eso no me gusta.
summary: Sola envía los archivos a otras 5 web

description:
En todas la versiones de ubuntu funcionaba bien.
En Ubuntu 22.04, la pantalla se queda en negro.

No funciona la captura de pantalla. Se realiza en negro, y una vez abierto desde el terminal con permisos del administrador del sistema. Luego puedes abrir archivos, pero una vez capturados desde otra aplicación. 
Utilizada en versiones anteriores de Ubuntu, y ha ido perfecto. De hecho para realizar trabajos con captura de pantalla es genial. Simplemente revisar en la última versión de Ubuntu salga correcto.
(error de bloqueo en el plug-in vgyme.pm)
En ubuntu 22.04 sólo funciona si utilizas xorg para gestionar las ventanas, con wayland (que ahora viene por defecto) no funciona la captura :(
NO SIRVE CON SCROLL EN UBUNTU 22.04
summary: NO SIRVE CON SCROLL EN UBUNTU 22.04

description: Fonctionne très bien et pouvoir mettre des figures (flèches / cercles / ...) sur l'image directement après est top
Facile et practique pour utilisation
Не запускается в Ubuntu 24.04, при сессии Wayland. Извечная проблема этоо удобного приложения.
Мне нравиться что интегрируется с различными сервисами в том числе с ftp
summary: На мой взгляд наиболее годное приложение

description: Хорошие возможности. Стрелки, ретушь и т.д.

Оказалось так, что эта штука намного удобнее всех других. Есть у каких-то ну чуток, что-то эффектнее, но такого диапазона возможностей как в этой программе я не смог подобрать. Я даже на долго переходил к другим вариантам. Но через несколько месяцев возвращался. Для меня чего-то удобнее чем Shutter нет. Не нашёл до сих пор.
can't take screenshots without X11 server
22.04系统中只能全屏幕截屏
